showTitles: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン

character.description:
Kobayashi's co-worker who is initially believed by Tohru to be a rival for Kobayashi's affections, but is really just an otaku who likes to talk about maids with her. Kobayashi helps him set up during Comiket every year. ~!Fafnir eventually decides to live with him to stay in the human world.!~

(Source: Wikipedia)
